channel.title: Posts on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Hugo website

item.title: World Happiness Index
item.description: How Happy is Your Country? The World Happiness Report is a landmark survey of the state of global happiness.The World Happiness 2016, which ranks 155 countries by their happiness levels, was released at the United Nations at an event celebrating International Day of Happiness on March 20th. The goal of this data is to study what factors policy-makers can employ to increase the happiness of their country’s population. Thanks to Kaggle, this data was provided in an easily accessible data set!

item.title: Summer in Cape Town
item.description: Hello! Cape Town, a place teaming with adventure, culture, and the avid pick-pockers on long street. This is a quick intro into my summer and some things I have been working on! Logistics I will be living in the beautiful Camps Bay. Our housing is situated right on the beach and with an epic right handed beach break down the road called, Glen’s Beach.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

blogdown::new_post(“Second New Post (in R Markdown)”, rmd = TRUE) title: A Summer in Cape Town author: Alex Carvalho date: ‘2017-06-05’ slug: first-new-post-in-plain-markdown categories: [] tags: [#liveeverdienever #fighton] blogdown::serve_site()
